title: Mugahed
author: Mugahed
content: How to get a 20% CoolWallet S Discount VoucherAfter the recent Hacking events that happened to Centralized and Decentralized Exchnages , the crypto community lost the confidence in the wallets of Centralized and Decentralized Exchnages, and most traders tended to buy the Cold Wallets (Hardware Wallets) for many properties especially the High Security property .Examples of the most Known Hardware Wallets :1- Ledger Nano wallets2- Trezor wallets3- SafePal S1 wallet4 - CoolWallet Pro and SBecause of these events, hardware wallet companies took advantage of the opportunity and made discounts in their products in addition to the Black Friday discounts ØŒFortunately for me ,I received a $40 discount Voucher to purchase CoolWallet S from Official Company Market .But for me , I don't need this Voucher because I have already have a CoolWallet S and I want to sell this Voucher for 25$ to anyone who wants to buy a CoolWallet S .Any one interested please dm me .
